40430.summary: Some customers in the Riverside Meadows area of North Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40430.title: Aug 9 – Red Deer (Riverside Meadows) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
